metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10879 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In Teeworlds 0.7.2, there is an integer overflow in CDataFileReader::Open()in engine/shared/datafile.cpp that can lead to a buffer overflow andpossibly remote code execution, because size-related multiplications aremishandled.

criterions.comment: teeworlds: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
